document_data.name: Toobar Starlight
document_data.mainbody: '''Toobar Starlight''' was the innkeeper in the [[Evening Star Inn]] of [[Freedale]] in the [[Dalelands]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was a pleasant man, who loved stargazing a little too much.
document_data.Activities: Together with his wife, he owned and ran the Evening Star Inn. Toobar spent his evening studying the stars.
